original_text: The Lord says, ‘ Zion's women are very proud. They walk with their heads up high. They turn their eyes towards the men and they have no shame. They like the men to look at them. They walk with small steps so that the rings on their ankles make a nice sound.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 말씀하시되 시온의 딸들이 교만하여 늘인 목, 정을 통하는 눈으로 다니며 아기작거려 걸으며 발로는 쟁쟁한 소리를 낸다 하시도다

sentences.original_text: They walk with their heads up high
They turn their eyes towards the men
They like the men to look at them
so that the rings on their ankles make a nice sound
sentences.korean_translation: 발목 고리가 아름다운 소리를 내게 하려 함이라
